blogs.title: How to Become a MERN Stack Developer
blogs.description: This blog explains the complete roadmap to becoming a MERN Stack Developer. It covers frontend and backend technologies, recommended learning resources, project ideas, and interview preparation tips. Beginners can use this guide to build strong fundamentals and practical experience.
blogs.author: Admin

blogs.title: Java Developer Roadmap for Freshers
blogs.description: This article provides a step-by-step learning path for fresh graduates who want to become professional Java developers. It includes core Java topics, frameworks, project ideas, and interview preparation strategies to help students crack job interviews.
blogs.author: Tech Team

blogs.title: Top Skills Every Software Developer Must Learn
blogs.description: This blog highlights the most important technical and soft skills required to succeed as a software developer. It discusses problem-solving, communication, coding best practices, and emerging technologies that developers should focus on.
blogs.author: Career Guide
